description: Drones been assigned zones, have travelled to locations and have begun reporting observations
Neptune shot at by an IADS
Neptune terminates scanning assigned zone and identifies partial no fly zone within the area
Operator decides based on information of Jupiter that we've found the wounded soldier. Saturn finished scanning one zone and auto moved on to another identified zone
Operator tells Jupiter to drop medical and communication pack
